  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3536</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3536</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Cançons populars i tradicionals a l'escola</string>
            <string language="en">Popular and traditional songs at school</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Populäre und traditionelle Liede an der Schule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chansons populaires et traditionnelles à 
l'école</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Canções populares e tradicionais na escola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Canzoni popolari e tradizionali alla scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημοφιλή και παραδοσιακά τραγούδια στο σχολείο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Publicació telemàtica endegada pel Departament d'Educació amb l'objectiu   de facilitar la tasca docent i contribuir d'aquesta manera a conservar, redescobrir i assumir aquest ric patrimoni de la tradició folklòrica, particular i general.</string>
            <string language="en">Telematic journal published by the Department of Education to facilitate the teaching process and so help conserve, rediscover, and appreciate our rich heritage of folklore, both personal and general.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">audició musical</string>
            <string language="en">music listening</string>
            <string language="es">audición musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cançó</string>
            <string language="en">song</string>
            <string language="es">canción</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Telematikjournal veröffentlichte durch das 
Ministerium für Erziehung und Wissenschaft, um den unterrichtenden 
Prozeß zu erleichtern und also helfen Sie, unser reiches Erbe der 
Folklore zu konservieren, wiederzuentdecken und zu schätzen, 
persönlich und allgemein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Journal télématique édité par le service de 
l'éducation pour faciliter le processus d'enseignement et pour aider 
ainsi à économiser, redécouvrir, et apprécier notre héritage 
riche du folklore, personnel et général.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O jornal telematic publicou pelo departamento de 
instrução para facilitar o processo ensinando e assim que ajude 
conservar, rediscover, e apreciar nosso heritage rico do folklore,  
pessoal e geral.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giornale telematico pubblicato dal reparto di 
formazione per facilitare il processo d'istruzione e così per 
contribuire a conservare, rediscover ed apprezzare la nostra eredità 
ricca di folclore, sia personale che generale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τηλεματικό περιοδικό που δημοσιεύονται από το 
τμήμα εκπαίδευσης για να διευκολύνουν τη διαδικασία διδασκαλίας 
και έτσι οι οδηγίες συντηρούν, ανακαλύπτουν πάλι, και εκτιμούν 
την πλούσια κληρονομιά λαογραφίας μας, και προσωπικής και 
γενικής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikhören</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoute de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chanson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltare di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canzone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τραγούδι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
